title: Tutorial wont load...
body:
I am new to this game and I downloaded it but it has been stuck on the same screen for a while now and it does not show me how much it has loaded or anything like that.  All its shows is a book and under it says "Tutorial" and under that is says to wait for it to finish downloading before playing the tutorial. At the bottom, it has 2 buttons skip and play and I can't click the play button. 
How long does it usually take to download?

replies.body:
Hmmmm....I can't say I can immediately recall the screen you are talking about.  Do you mind taking a screenshot really quickly and responding back with it?  It should give me a much clearer idea as to what is going on.

Looking forward to your response! ^.^
How can I post a picture here? There is no attach file or image option :p
